# selectedColor

**Instance Property**

The selected color in the color picker.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var selectedColor: UIColor? { get set }
```

## Discussion

When a person selects a new color in the color picker, the system generates the control event [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIControl/Event/valueChanged].

This property is KVO-compliant.

## Configuring color picker attributes

- **title**: The title for the color picker.
- **maximumLinearExposure**: The maximum exposure to apply to a color when returned by the color well.
- **supportsAlpha**: A Boolean value that determines whether the color picker supports alpha values.
- **supportsEyedropper**: If set to `NO` the eyedropper functionality is not supported for this color well.
